'''Holly''' was a thorny evergreen species of ilex. In [[Middle-earth]], it was especially abundant in the land of [[Hollin]], which took its name from this tree.<ref>{{FR|II3}}</ref>  The [[Sindarin]] word for "holly" was ''[[ereg]]''.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''ereg''</ref>
